loading.title: Loading your suggestions...
loading.subtitle: We are preparing the most suitable suggestions for you.

stats.title: Your Suggestions
stats.subtitle: Each suggestion is an opportunity carefully selected for you by our team.

main.title: Manage Suggestions
main.errorLoading: An error occurred while loading suggestions: {error}

dialogs.approveDescription: Approving a suggestion is an exciting step. Are you sure you want to proceed? After confirmation, the matchmaker will be notified and will continue the process for you.
dialogs.declineDescription: Every answer moves you forward. Are you sure you want to decline this suggestion? Your feedback is very important and will help us refine the search for you.

toasts.errorDescription: Try refreshing the page or contact support.
toasts.newSuggestionsDescription: Check out the new suggestions waiting for you.
toasts.approvedFirstPartyDesc: With your approval, the suggestion has been sent to the other party. If they also approve, your contact details will be exchanged.
toasts.approvedSecondPartyDesc: Great! Now that you've both approved, your contact details will be sent to the first party, and theirs to you.
toasts.declinedDesc: Thank you for the feedback - it helps us provide better matches.
toasts.matchmakerNotified: The matchmaker will be notified and will proceed with the process.
toasts.refreshSuccessDescription: All suggestions have been updated to the current state.

card.whySpecial: Why is this a special match?
card.reasonTeaserDefault: The matchmaker identified special potential worth exploring!
card.clickForDetails: Click for full details and more insights

buttons.approveDisabledTooltip: Cannot approve a new suggestion while another is in an active process.

header.title: An Offer Chosen Especially For You
header.subtitleLine1: We thought of you when we saw this profile.
header.subtitleLine2: We believe there's a real foundation here for a meaningful connection.
header.matchStorySubtitle1: We listen to what's important to you, even between the lines.
header.matchStorySubtitle2: Here are some of the connections we identified.
header.whyYou: Why this is a fit for you:
header.whatsNextTitle: What Now? The Decision is Yours
header.whatsNextSubtitle1: Every decision you make is the right step on your journey.
header.whatsNextSubtitle2: Take your time, and choose what feels right to you.

actions.titleExpanded: ✨ This is the key moment - what's your decision?
actions.subtitle: Every decision is a new opportunity
actions.reminder: Remember: Every decision moves us one step closer to finding your perfect match.

profile.loadingDescription: This might take a few seconds
profile.errorDescription: We couldn't load the profile. Please contact the matchmaker for assistance.

aiAnalysisCta.title: 🔮 Want a Deeper Look?
aiAnalysisCta.description: Our smart AI can analyze all the data and provide you with professional insights on connection potential, strengths, and even conversation starters.

aiAnalysis.loadingDescription: We are examining dozens of parameters to provide you with a comprehensive and accurate picture.
aiAnalysis.errorAlertDescription: We apologize for the issue. Please try again or contact support.

considerTab.title: Points for Thought and Open Conversation

aiAnalysis.noteText: Remember, this analysis is a tool and a recommendation only. It's designed to highlight points for thought and spark conversation. True chemistry and deep connection are formed in human interaction.

emptyState.noResultsDescription: Try changing your search or filter criteria to find what you're looking for.
emptyState.noHistoryDescription: When you have completed suggestions, they will appear here.
emptyState.noActiveDescription: Our matchmakers are currently working on finding the perfect matches for you.

controls.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, city, or profession...

aiCta.title: רוצה חוות דעת נוספת?
aiCta.description: קבל ניתוח מעמיק מבוסס AI על נקודות החיבור, פוטנציאל לצמיחה ואפילו רעיונות לפתיחת שיחה.

rationale.title: A Special Suggestion For You
rationale.personalNoteTitle: Why I thought this is a great fit for you
rationale.noReasonText: The matchmaker trusts the data to speak for itself.
